Warnings
  • Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Figures/edge: unknown concept "graph"
  • Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Figures/edge: unknown concept "tree"
Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Figures/edge

Function Edge edge(str from, str to, FProperty props...)
Description An edge connects nodes in trees, graphs, and treemaps. The arguments from and to are node ids.
Examples See tree, graph, or treemap.
